batchSimulateDropOffs(address[],uint256[.details: Efficient way to create multiple test records

params.amounts: Array of token amounts to issue
params.users: Array of user addresses to receive rewards

params.listingId: ID of the listing to buy from

returns.listingId: The ID of the created listing

revokeDrop(uint256,string).details: Useful for testing revocation functionality or handling disputes

params.dropId: ID of the drop to revoke

run().custom:operation: Examples of operations performed: - Grant MINTER_ROLE to new addresses - Display contract statistics - Verify role assignments
run().details: Main interaction function - demonstrates common operations

simulateDropOff(address,uint256,address,.details: Useful for testing reward distribution or creating test data

params.amount: Amount of tokens to issue (in wei)
params.user: Address to receive the reward tokens

returns.dropId: The ID of the created drop record

run().notice: Use this for general maintenance and role management

simulateDropOff(address,uint256,address,.notice: Simulate a recycling drop-off and token reward issuance

verifyRoles(address).notice: Verify role assignments for an address
